Text:
function EP03_31()
    --.結-6【9月第4週】「美女と野獣」
    SaveData.Title = "美女と野獣"

    --//BG：大講堂正面（スポットライト無し）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I visited the great auditorium during Erika Ikusa and her group's performance time. ]])

    MSG([[ As Erika Ikusa had said, on the front-row seat lay a handwritten paper with "Uran Ryuguuin" and my name written on it. ]])

    MSG([[ I pocketed the paper, presumably written by Erika Ikusa herself, and took my seat. ]])

    MSG([[ If I recall correctly, Erika Ikusa’s class was performing a play based on the Western fairy tale "Beauty and the Beast." ]])

    MSG([[ Although it’s a story I’ve loved since childhood and I was looking forward to it, the image of the man playing the Beast crossed my mind, making me feel uneasy. ]])

    MSG([[ I understand Erika Ikusa’s intent. ]])

    MSG([[ "Beauty and the Beast" is a love story in which a kind-hearted, brave woman named Belle connects with a Beast who was turned into a hideous form due to his weak heart. ]])

    MSG([[ The Beast, who reforms and learns to respect others, ultimately finds true love. ]])

    MSG([[ Through Belle, who initially shunned the Beast but gradually deepened her love as she understood his inner self, Erika Ikusa aims to seek understanding for coeducation. ]])

    MSG([[ However, such a sermon won’t shake the hearts of the conservatives. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter that Erika Ikusa won the Princess Election, they won’t change their ideology. ]])

    MSG([[ Once this play ends, Erika Ikusa and I will be enemies again. But, for this moment alone, I want to purely enjoy the stage she has created. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely Erika Ikusa has no ulterior motive; she must have invited me to this performance simply to entertain me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0901.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Everyone, thank you very much for waiting. We will now begin the stage presentation of 1-A and the boys’ division joint performance of the play ‘Beauty and the Beast.’" ]])

    --//BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 300,true)

    MSG([[ As Erika Ikusa finished her announcement, the lights on the stage illuminated. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, a surprising casting choice appearing in the center of the stage caused murmurs of astonishment throughout the venue. ]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)

    --//CG：美女と野獣（オウガのみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0902.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"My beloved daughters, as I said before, I am going to the town. Is there anything you want?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0903.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Come now, dear Belle. Tell me your wish, just as your elder sisters have." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0904.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"I want to give you a small gift to repay your usual devotion." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0241.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"Well then, Father, may I request a single rose?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0242.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"There isn’t a single rose bush around here, so I have longed for one. If it is placed on the dining table, it will surely add beautiful color to our meals starting tomorrow." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0905.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Ah, what a humble wish. Leave it to me. I shall bring back not just one but an armful of roses." ]])

    MSG([[ Saying so, Erika Ikusa, disguised as a middle-aged man, disappeared backstage. ]])

    MSG([[ Belle, left behind, continued modestly wiping and sweeping while enduring sarcastic remarks from her sisters. ]])

    MSG([[ Her appearance was a commoner’s Western-style dress, with some stains and patches visible here and there. ]])

    MSG([[ Yet, with long hair reaching her waist, healthy and glossy skin, and long eyelashes, she clearly appeared more graceful compared to her sisters. ]])

    MSG([[ Her looks perfectly matched the image of Belle I had imagined from the story I had read in the past. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0257.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】Surprised
"T-The one playing Belle is... no way, Ouga Rokujou!? That arrogant guy is cross-dressing and even changing his voice...!?" ]])

    MSG([[ It seems I was not the only one to notice, as the audience gradually began to stir. ]])

    MSG([[ As the story progressed and the Beast made an appearance, the audience’s confusion deepened. ]])

    --//CG：美女と野獣（野獣ヒユのみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV019ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0262.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"Hey, you! Not only do you stay at my mansion without permission, but you also try to steal the rose—which is more precious than my life—what an ungrateful wretch!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0906.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Eek! A m-monster...!? P-please save me, please spare my life!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0263.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"No way, I won’t forgive you. If you want my forgiveness, you must send me the one daughter you love the most within three months." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0264.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"I was once called ‘the heartless one’ and turned into this Beast’s form." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0265.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"I was told that if I reconsider my heart, I could return to my original form. But no one here in this mansion watches over my heart." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0266.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"I need a wife who looks into my heart. I will never harm her. I swear to keep my promise to the very end and will not take your life either." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0267.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"So you must keep your promise to me as well. Understood? Within three months, no exceptions." ]])

    MSG([[ The shaggy beast pressing Erika Ikusa was none other than Hiyu Shinosaki. The face peeking out from the furry costume—unbelievably—was Hiyu. ]])

    MSG([[ The very misogynistic Hiyu playing the role of the Beast, no less. ]])

    MSG([[ Yet, his exaggerated gestures and running around the stage on all fours with beast-like movements carried a power that erased the fact that a girl was playing a man. ]])

    MSG([[ Despite the odd casting of boys playing females and girls playing males, not a single discord arose. ]])

    MSG([[ Initially, the audience was clearly confused, but soon everyone was absorbed, watching the characters on stage intently and following their story. ]])

    MSG([[ Such a stage could only have been realized by Erika Ikusa. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0258.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】Sadness
"No... it’s not only Erika Ikusa." ]])

    MSG([[ Yes. It is not only Erika Ikusa who is wonderful. ]])

    MSG([[ To make this stage come to life, everyone involved must connect their hearts. ]])

    MSG([[ I had heard from Yuri that there were conservative students even in Erika Ikusa’s class. ]])

    MSG([[ Collaborating with the boys’ division to weave a single story must have involved unimaginable struggles. ]])

    MSG([[ Perhaps this gender-reversed play was born incidentally amid those struggles. ]])

    MSG([[ This play evokes various imaginations about its background. But at this moment, not a single performer on stage looks troubled. ]])

    MSG([[ I feel all their hearts have become one. ]])

    --//CG：美女と野獣（オウガ・野獣ヒユ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV019ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0268.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"Belle! Why do you hate me!? I gave you magnificent dresses! Rich meals, beautiful roses, rooms filled with books!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0269.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"I fulfilled all your wishes! I served you! What more do you want!? How can you love me!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0243.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"I have never once told you my wishes. You only spoke of wanting me to look at you, but never once have you looked into my heart." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0244.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"Love is like a flower. You think that by giving water and fertilizer, the flower will grow—but that’s wrong." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0245.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"To nurture a flower, you need to touch the soil, look up at the sky, feel the air on your skin, and stay close beside the closed bud." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0246.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"<r=はなびら>Only looking at the petals</r>, the way you do now, you can never nurture love." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0270.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"Belle!! You! Youuuu!" ]])

    MSG([[ The Beast’s roar echoed through the hall. That heart-wrenching misunderstanding made my chest feel as if it would be torn apart. ]])

    MSG([[ When I was defeated in the recent Princess Election, I experienced the same feelings as the Beast now. ]])

    MSG([[ As a representative of the conservatives, I poured my heart out preaching the importance of "unchanging values." I believed everyone would understand. ]])

    MSG([[ But... the result was defeat. My feelings did not reach them. ]])

    MSG([[ The moment the election results came out, I felt a blazing hatred towards the coeducation faction flare deep in my chest. ]])

    MSG([[ I thought myself narrow-minded, but that defeat was unbearably painful. ]])

    MSG([[ But soon after, that flame began to calm. ]])

    --//effect：セピア調
FILTER_SCREEN(2)

    --//BG：校舎前（昼）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")
    --//BU：エリカ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERI01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[ Without a single grudge or boastful victory proclamation, Erika Ikusa invited me to her play. ]])

    MSG([[ Standing before her innocent smile, I realized why I was defeated. ]])

    MSG([[ Her "dance" and mine were opposites. ]])

    MSG([[ While I denied coeducation and tried to assert the correctness of my values, she accepted the conservatives' existence and conveyed the appeal of coeducation. ]])

    MSG([[ Perhaps her imitating Hermes Himegami’s dance first was meant to express the unchanging status quo. ]])

FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    --//CG：美女と野獣（野獣ヒユ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV019ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0271.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"Ah, my beloved Belle. Come back to me. Losing you, sinking again into the sea of loneliness, I finally understood." ]])

    MSG([[ The scene shifted to the story’s climax. ]])

    MSG([[ The Beast, learning that Belle's father collapsed from the worry of losing his daughter, gave Belle medicine and allowed her to return to her hometown. ]])

    MSG([[ Though he said "You need not return," the Beast’s heart still could not abandon his love for Belle and he lamented bitterly. ]])

    MSG([[ His awkward stance was deeply moving. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0272.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"You spoke many words to me out of love." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0273.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"Love isn’t just about giving. It’s about taking hands, looking into each other’s eyes, and cherishing each other." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0274.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"Until the day you forgive me and show me your beautiful form again, I pledge on this rose to love you forever, eternally." ]])

    MSG([[ Like the Beast demanding love, I saw only the choice of maintaining the status quo. ]])

    MSG([[ Erika Ikusa, viewing Yuriai Private Academy as a whole, affirmed the conservatives’ thoughts and worked hard to convey her own ideas. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s obvious which side the students found more appealing. ]])

    MSG([[ And the story finally reaches its conclusion— ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0247.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"Ah, I apologize, my beloved Beast, Beato. Thanks to your medicine, my father was saved." ]])

    MSG([[ In the dusty castle, Belle embraced the Beast’s body, now thin and losing fur. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0248.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"Yet, I left you alone, trapped in this cold mansion by yourself." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0249.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"Why did you not tell me that you would die if you remained in the Beast’s form? Had you told me, I would have given you all my little love." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0275.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"You taught me that it’s not enough just to make the flower bloom." ]])

    MSG([[ The Beast’s large hand gently wiped the tears streaming down Belle’s cheek. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0276.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"I always imposed only my wishes, but at the end, I granted one wish of my beloved." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0277.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hiyu】
"Now, smile for me. Smile, Belle. If I am seen off by your lovely smile, death is nothing to fear." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0250.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"No. You must not die." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0251.wav")
    MSG([[
【Ouga】
"You must live forever as my husband. Please accept this love." ]])

    MSG([[ Belle touched the Beast’s hand and softly kissed the back of it. ]])

    MSG([[ At that moment— ]])
    --//CG：美女と野獣（スモーク）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV019ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ The stage was enveloped in pure white smoke. ]])

    MSG([[ The ending that followed was classic. Surely, Hiyu Shinosaki returned to his original prince form and was united with Ouga Rokujou. ]])

    MSG([[ As I eagerly awaited what costume Hiyu would change into, a figure gradually stepped forward out of the fading smoke. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0259.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
"Eh—" ]])

    MSG([[ I lost my words the moment I realized the identity of that figure. Because— ]])

    --//CG：美女と野獣（煙の中から男装エリカ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV019ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0907.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"My beloved Belle, thank you for loving me despite everything." ]])

    MSG([[ Erika Ikusa, dressed in a lavish prince’s costume, was extending her hand to me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0260.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
"E-Erika Ikusa...? H-How..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0908.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Thanks to you. With the power of your love, the witch’s spell was broken, and I was able to return to my original form." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0909.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"I want to repay this favor with a lifetime’s worth of love. Will you accept my love?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0910.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"If you accept it, take my hand and dance the waltz of love with me." ]])

    MSG([[ Unable to grasp the sudden situation, I was stunned. ]])

    MSG([[ But my hand naturally overlapped with Erika Ikusa’s, and led by her, I ascended the stage. ]])

    --//SE：黄色い悲鳴
--PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav")

    --//CG：美女と野獣（煙が晴れて、背景に全員集合）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV019af")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Cheers sounded in the distance. All of Erika Ikusa’s "Knights" and the boys’ division gathered on stage. Then, the pair dance began. ]])

    MSG([[ With uncertain steps, I moved my arms and legs, trying to imitate Erika Ikusa. However, the movements were completely different from Japanese dance, and I couldn’t keep up. ]])

    MSG([[ Erika Ikusa gently guided me by pulling my hands and feet as if leading me. ]])

    MSG([[ That kindness touched my heart. The passion I had felt moments ago over the Princess Election results suddenly seemed pitiful. ]])

    MSG([[ Unaware of my resentment, Erika Ikusa whispered softly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0911.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"If not for the election against Uran Ryuguuin, I would never have understood the struggles of the conservatives and might have lived my school life so carefree." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0912.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"It’s thanks to competing with Uran Ryuguuin that we can all stand on stage laughing together like this now." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0913.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"That’s why... I really wanted Uran Ryuguuin to see this stage." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0914.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"I’m sorry for such a selfish wish." ]])

    MSG([[ I almost sighed in disbelief. ]])

    MSG([[ So kind as always. Since Erika Ikusa defeated me, it would be natural and her right to prove her justification to the loser. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though I feel as if I might be consumed by the flames of jealousy at any moment. ]])

    MSG([[ To cool the hot feelings inside me, tears began to trickle from my eyes. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0915.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Uran, san...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0261.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
"Erika Ikusa... may I trust you? After trampling on your feelings, do I still have the right to love you again?" ]])

    MSG([[ Erika Ikusa gently hid my profile with her cloak, moving so the audience could not see my tearful face. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, at an angle visible only to me, she smiled softly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0916.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Of course, my beloved Belle. No matter what hardships or misunderstandings arise, our love is eternal." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0917.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"So, smile for me. Just for now, I want to monopolize your delicate smile." ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn’t help but laugh at Erika Ikusa’s theatrical and cheesy line. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0262.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
"You’re quite a greedy Beast, aren’t you? Fine, it’s no problem. I will give you all of my face and love." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0263.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
"Not just for now, but forever, always..." ]])

    MSG([[ I kept dancing with Erika Ikusa until the music ended. ]])
    --//BGM：フェードアウト
STOP_BGM(3000)

    --//BG：黒バック
    PLAY_SE("SEa019.wav",1000,true)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)

    --//SE：拍手
--PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav",0,true)

    --//SE：歓声（MAX）
PLAY_SE("SEa019.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[ As the stage lights went out, an applause louder than even the Princess Election announcement resounded. ]])

    MSG([[ I had never heard such magnificent applause before. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely it was a rare event in the over one hundred years of Yuriai Private Academy’s history. ]])

    MSG([[ Thus, once again, I painfully realized that I could never compare to Erika Ikusa. ]])
    --　　　　　◆
    STOP_ALL_SOUND(1000)
    --STOP_SE("SEa019.wav",1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_32")
end
